query:
SELECT
                    code, 
                    solutions.points,
                    solutions.id,
                    valid,
                    last_improved_date,
                    is_post_mortem as "is_post_mortem!",
                    score,
                    rank
                FROM solutions
                LEFT JOIN scores
                ON scores.id = solutions.id
                WHERE solutions.author=$1 AND solutions.challenge=$2 AND solutions.language=$3
                ORDER BY is_post_mortem DESC, score ASC
                LIMIT 1
